p: The purified A. occidentale bark liquid was able to inhibit Bacillus subtilis growth (0.6%) and alter its morphology (0.4%). The activity of the purified cashew nut shell liquid was tested using the colony counting method, where an IC 50 of 0.35% (v/v) was observed, presenting a bactericidal effect as well as cellular elongation suggesting bacterial cell division proteins may be a cashew nut shell liquid target ( 196).
